data.title: Christina Martinez Mundo - Beach Volleyball
data.meta_description:

2022 - 2nd Team All-OVC (Volleyball)

EIU VOLLEYBALL
2023 (SENIOR): Played in all 33 of

2024 Beach Volleyball Roster

Choose a Player:

Sandy King

Sandy King

4 Christina Martinez Mundo

Height 5-6

Class Senior

Major Public Relations

Hometown San Juan, Puerto Rico

Highschool Colegio Rosa-Bell

Bio

Historical

Biography

2023 - 1st Team All-OVC (Volleyball)

2022 - 2nd Team All-OVC (Volleyball)

EIU VOLLEYBALL

2023 (SENIOR): Played in all 33 of EIU's matches as the libero... named a first team All-Ohio Valley Conference selection... named OVC Tournament MVP after leading EIU to second OVC Tournament title and NCAA Tournament appearance... played in a team-high 120 sets... was second in the OVC in digs (676) and digs per set (5.63)... she was also top five nationally in both categories... ended the season with a reception percentage of .928... recorded a season-high of 34 digs with an average of 8.5 digs per set against UT Martin (9/23)... her 33 digs (11.0 DPS) in the OVC Tournament Championship match against Southeast Missouri were the most in a three-set match by any player nationally in 2023... recorded double-digit digs in all but two matches, including 18 matches with at least 20 digs... was second on the team in service aces with a total of 39 (0.33 SAPS)... Academic All-District as selected by College Sports Communicatorsâ€¦

2022 (JUNIOR): Appeared in all 32 matches during the 2022 season... named a second team All-Ohio Valley Conference selection... one of three players to appear in every match... appeared in 120 sets during the season at the libero position, the most sets played by a Panther since 2015... recorded an EIU record 598 digs with a 4.98 digs per set average... second highest digs per set average in school history... ranked third in the OVC in digs and digs per set... ranked 23rd in the NCAA in digs pet set and 13th in total digs... had double digit digs in every match but one vs. Illinois (nine digs)... had over 20 digs in 12 matches... had a career high 38 digs at Chicago State (9/2)... was second on the team in reception percentage with a .959 (min. 100 attempts)... second on the team with 27 service aces... third on the team in assists with 136... recorded her 1,000 assists during the season.... OVC Academic Medal of Honor...

2021 (SOPHOMORE): Appeared in 22 matches during the 2021 season... appeared in 83 sets during the season starting the season as the starting libero, ended the year as a defensive specialist... led team with 3.13 digs (3.77 per set) posting double figure digs in 15 of 22 matches... was seventh in the Ohio Valley Conference in digs per set with 3.77... collected a season high 26 digs against Northern Illinois... placed second on the team in service aces with 22... posted at least 20 digs in five matches... was third in on the team in assists with 55... collected a season high seven assists at Belmont...

2020 (FRESHMAN): Played in all 16 matches during the 2020 season contested in the spring of 2021... appeared in 55 of 56 sets during the season starting season as a defensive specialist, ended year as starter at libero... led team with 218 digs (3.96 per set) posting double figure digs in 12 of 16 matches... named OVC Defensive Player of the Week following two matches against Tennessee State... season high 27 digs in both home matches against Tennessee State... added 24 digs in final regular season match at SIUE and 23 digs in win at Murray State... led team with 12 service aces with high of three in opening match at Murray State... had one kill and 29 assists during the season...

EIU BEACH VOLLEYBALL

2024 (SENIOR): Played in all 18 matches during the season... posted a 5-12 record with one match left unfinished... played majority of the season at No. 2 pairs posting a 5-10 record in that spot in the playing order... five wins was tied for second most in a season in the brief EIU Beach history... three of five wins came in OVC action with wins against Lindenwood, Morehead State and Tennessee Tech... additional two wins both came against McKendree... finished playing career ranked first in EIU Beach wins with 12 and also first in career wins playing at No. 2 pairs with 11...

2023 (JUNIOR): Played in 13 matches during the season with a 4-9 record, did not play in one match in Ohio Valley Conference Tournament due to match being decided before No. 1 pairs started... played in top three positions in the line-up during the year with five matches at No. 1 pairs and six matches No. 2 pairs... posted a 3-3 record at No. 2 pairs with one of those wins clinching program's first-ever win with as they beat McKendree, played with Tori Mohesky in clinching match... also played with Mohesky with two other wins at No. 2 pairs, both against Lindenwood in OVC play... had one win at No. 1 pairs playing with Mohesky with a win over Morehead State... ended year ranked first in career wins in EIU record book list... OVC Academic Medal of Honor...

2022 (SOPHOMORE): Played in Eastern Illinois' inaugural beach volleyball season in 2022... appeared in 12 matches during the season... played primarily in the number two duo spot... earned EIU's first ever match win at #10 Missouri Baptist on Mar. 21 in three sets... won her second career match against Jacksonville State in two sets on Apr. 2... was part of the first ever Panther duo to win a match at the OVC Tournament against Morehead State in three sets... also played against #2 Austin Peay at the OVC Tournament...

HIGH SCHOOL: Played volleyball at Colegio Rosa-Bell as a defensive specialist for Coach Marivi Morales... also competes for GVA (Guaynabo Volleyball Academy) which was ranked No. 2 in Puerto Rico and No. 46 in the USA at the AAU National Championship... was named an All-Star at the 2018 Jeep Championship and 2018 Spring Challenge...
